'''Ominous Dish''' is a peculiar dish that is obtained during the [[Can't Make an Omelette Without Eggs]] branch of [[Bennett]]'s [[Hangout Events|Hangout Event]], [[Fantastic Voyage (Hangout Event)]]. It is created using [[Slime Condensate]], [[Radish]], and [[Mint]].
